mapper.select: select c.id as CU_ID, c.PARENT_NAME AS PARENT_NAME, c.NAME AS NAME, sum(q.ORDER_QUANTITY) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, AVG(o.QUANTITY_ONDUTY) AS QUANTITY_ONDUTY, o.QUANTITY_ONDUTY AS QUANTITY_ONDUTY from JD_LE_LABOUR_ONDUTY o left join NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT c on c.id=o.CU_ID left join JD_LE_ORDER_QUANTITY q on q.CU_ID=c.id where c.PARENT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{area},'%') and o.BIZ_DATE > #{starttime} and o.BIZ_DATE < #{endtime} and c.NAME like CONCAT('%',#{pimsname},'%') group by c.id LIMIT #{startpages},#{endpages}
select AVG(e.AVG_EFFICIENCY) as AVG_EFFICIENCY from jd_le_labour_efficiency e where cu_id =#{cuid} and e.BIZ_DATE > #{starttime} and e.BIZ_DATE < #{endtime}
select PERSON_TYPE,QUANTITY_ONDUTY from jd_le_labour_onduty where cu_id=#{cuid} and BIZ_DATE > #{starttime} and BIZ_DATE < #{endtime} group by PERSON_TYPE

select count(DISTINCT o.cu_id) from JD_LE_LABOUR_ONDUTY o left join NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT c on c.id=o.CU_ID where c.PARENT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{area},'%') and o.BIZ_DATE > #{starttime} and o.BIZ_DATE < #{endtime} and c.NAME like CONCAT('%',#{pimsname},'%') group by c.id
